trans-unit.source: Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> (within the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance) results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Intenta guardar los datos de personalización cuando el usuario está ejecutando actualmente no tiene la capacidad de llamar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> (dentro del actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instancia) da como resultado un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> excepción.

trans-unit.source: Note that this would only be true if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control called the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Save%2A> method directly.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que esto sólo sería true si la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control llama protegido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Save%2A> método directamente.

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.
trans-unit.target: En la implementación de ASP.NET, en realidad se llama a un método auxiliar interno para realizar la operación de guardar y este método auxiliar retorna silenciosamente si el usuario está ejecutando actualmente no tiene derechos para modificar los datos.

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have the capability called <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability" />.
trans-unit.target: El usuario actual no tiene la función llamada <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: La instancia <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> no puede hacer referencia a un proveedor de personalización válido.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
No personalization provider is currently associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: No hay ningún proveedor de personalización actualmente asociado a la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />.

trans-unit.source: This can occur if this method is called prior to calling <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" /> (the personalization provider reference is obtained during the call to <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" />.
trans-unit.target: Esto puede ocurrir si se llama a este método antes de llamar a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" /> (la referencia del proveedor de personalización se obtiene durante la llamada a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" />).

trans-unit.source: \- or -
No personalization state has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: No se ha cargado ningún estado de personalización.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> para el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> asociado es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -

The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> en la instancia <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> asociada del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current personalization scope for the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el ámbito de personalización actual para el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> primario.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> instance indicating the scope of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Una enumeración <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> que indica el ámbito del objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: This value is initially set based on the value returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este valor se establece inicialmente en función del valor devuelto de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This value can be modified by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este valor puede modificarse mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Note that this represents the scope used for applying and extracting personalization information.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que esto representa el ámbito utilizado para aplicar y extraer información de personalización.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property might differ from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El valor de esta propiedad puede diferir de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> propiedad o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Marks the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Marca el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> primario como poseedor de datos de personalización que han cambiado (está "sucio").

trans-unit.source: Marks the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Marca el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> primario como poseedor de datos de personalización que han cambiado (está "sucio").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> propiedad está establecida en `true`, este método marca el elemento primario <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlar como "modificados".

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Dependiendo de los detalles de implementación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instancia del control de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, este método puede invocar comprobaciones de seguridad y comprobaciones de permiso de seguridad de acceso de código.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, este método llama a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> property rather than through this method.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control realiza el seguimiento de estado "sucio" internamente y expone la "suciedad" del administrador a través de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> propiedad en lugar de hacerlo a través de este método.

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: No se ha cargado ningún dato de personalización.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Los controles de elementos Web que se van a marcar como "sucios".

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified Web Parts control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Marca el control de elementos Web especificado como poseedor de datos de personalización que han cambiado (está "sucio").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the specified Web Parts control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> propiedad está establecida en `true`, este método marca el control de elementos Web especificado como "sucio".

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method may invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Dependiendo de los detalles de implementación de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instancia del control de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, este método puede invocar comprobaciones de seguridad y comprobaciones de permiso de seguridad de acceso de código.

trans-unit.source: Attempted to mark as "dirty" a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Se ha intentado marcar como "sucio" un control de elementos Web no administrado por el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> primario.

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: No se ha cargado ningún dato de personalización.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si se han restablecido los datos de personalización de la página actual (por ejemplo, si se realizó una solicitud para eliminar los datos de personalización del almacén de datos subyacente).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se ha restablecido el estado de personalización para la página actual; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped.
trans-unit.target: Si esta propiedad se establece en `true`, indica que se ha restablecido el estado de personalización para la página actual y que la extracción de datos de personalización de los controles y posteriores operaciones de almacenamiento se deben omitir.

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Actualmente, esta propiedad se establece automáticamente en `true` por la infraestructura de personalización si el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A> se llama al método.

trans-unit.source: Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que aunque no hay ninguna restricción sobre cuándo se puede establecer esta propiedad, la propiedad debe establecerse en `true` anteriores a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> del control <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> evento surta efecto.

trans-unit.source: Switches the current page's personalization scope from <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> or from <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" />.
trans-unit.target: Cambia el ámbito de personalización de la página actual de <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> a <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> o de <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> a <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" />.

trans-unit.source: This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Este método alterna el ámbito de personalización de la página está ejecutando actualmente.

trans-unit.source: Toggling the scope results in a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> back to the current executing page.
trans-unit.target: Activa o desactiva el ámbito da como resultado un <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> volver a la página de ejecución actual.

trans-unit.source: This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Este método no realiza ninguna operación si se llama durante una exportación o importación de un control de elementos Web se está produciendo.

trans-unit.source: If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request.
trans-unit.target: Si se produce una solicitud de ámbito de alternancia de una página que se envió a través de un `POST` solicitud y, a continuación, los valores de cadena de consulta se conservarán durante la transferencia; no se conservan los parámetros de cadena de consulta si la página se envió a través de un `GET` solicitud.

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El código siguiente muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger code sample found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class description.
trans-unit.target: Este código forma parte de un ejemplo de código mayor se encuentra en la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> descripción de la clase.

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have the user capability to enter <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope when attempting to switch from <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> scope to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: El usuario actual no tiene la función del usuario para entrar en el ámbito <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> cuando se intenta cambiar del ámbito <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> al ámbito <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance has not completed initialization.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> no ha completado la inicialización.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> para el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> asociado es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -

The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> en la instancia <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> asociada del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to toggle to a scope that is not defined in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Se intentó cambiar a un ámbito no definido en la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" />.

trans-unit.source: Technically, this situation should never occur.
trans-unit.target: Técnicamente, esta situación nunca debe producirse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of user capabilities from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> granted to the current user.
trans-unit.target: Recibe el conjunto de funciones de usuario del objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> concedido al usuario actual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the set of user capabilities granted to the current user, or an empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary" /> if the user is anonymous.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contiene el conjunto de funciones del usuario concedidas al usuario actual o <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary" /> vacío si el usuario es anónimo.

trans-unit.source: Currently the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> class contains two values indicating a user's capabilities: `modifyState` and `enterSharedScope`.
trans-unit.target: Actualmente el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> clase contiene dos valores que indican las capacidades de un usuario: `modifyState` y `enterSharedScope`.

trans-unit.source: For ease of use, the capabilities contained within the dictionary can be checked with the helper properties <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsModifiable%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CanEnterSharedScope%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para facilitar su uso, se pueden comprobar las funciones contenidas dentro del diccionario con las propiedades de la aplicación auxiliar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsModifiable%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CanEnterSharedScope%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Note the restrictions on changing capabilities after either of these properties have been accessed; for details, see the description section of each property.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta las restricciones de modificación de funciones una vez haya accedido cualquiera de estas propiedades; Para obtener más información, vea la sección de descripción de cada propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the current parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una instancia del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> primario actual asociado a esta instancia de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />.

trans-unit.source: The current parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> primario actual.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with this instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilice esta propiedad para determinar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control asociado a esta instancia de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> clase.
